snippet.title: Pixelitos Trailer
snippet.description:
Pixelitos is a new creature-collecting auto-battler game made by ElStrawFedora.
Play on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2999540/Pixelitos__Spritle_Royale/
Play on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.elstrawfedora.autobattler
Play on Itch.io: https://elstrawfedora.itch.io/pixelitos
Build teams of digital creatures called Pixelitos, and with them, fight your way to be the top Pixel Master!
